# Summary

Presentation at the [Georgia Suicide Prevention Conference](https://preventsuicidega.org/event/conference-25/). Presented data from a survey of military reservists, highlighting risk factors for suicide. Risks included prior homeless and sudden job loss, with risks varying depending on gender and race.
